channel.title: salangai oli on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in salangai oli on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: LfE 8: Gifford Lectures and Indian Festivities
item.description: 23/10/2009 Greetings! I recover from a cough as I write this. The reason for the long silence is the fever I had last weekend. I know you kind-hearted people are starting to worry already!

item.title: Thakita Thadimi (Salangai Oli) Lyrics Translated
item.description: I recommend this beautiful movie to everyone. In this song, the uber-talented dancer has become an alcoholic and he sings and dances referring to the past he shares with the widow who is watching him.
